```{r}
library(DMwR)
creditcard <- read.csv("creditcard.csv")
creditcard$Class <- factor(creditcard$Class, levels = c("1", "0"), labels = c("Yes", "No"))
creditcard <- creditcard[sample(nrow(creditcard)),]
set.seed(4356)
smote_data <- SMOTE(Class ~ ., data  = creditcard, perc.over = 300, perc.under = 150, k=5)
new.data <- sample(2, nrow(smote_data), replace = TRUE, prob = c(0.7, 0.3))
trainSplit <-smote_data[new.data==1,]
testSplit <-smote_data[new.data==2,]
```

```{r}
#SVM
```

```{r}
#RÃ©gression Logistique
set.seed(123)
log.model <- glm(Class~.,binomial(link='logit'),trainSplit)
log.predict <- predict(log.model,testSplit,type="response")
pred=rep("Yes",length(log.predict))
pred[log.predict > 0.5] = "No"
```
